Room.Name: Tristram's Temple
Room.ShortDescription: This is Tristram's Temple, on level two of the underground city.
Room.LongDescription: True children of Tristram may rest here, where the palpable glow of holiness will speed the healing of their wounds. The beauty of this place will also gladden their hearts. Magnificent light green marble pillars line the walls, rising up to a ceiling that is so high, it's lost in the swirling mist. A magical rope rises up from the floor into the mist, with no end in sight. o
